src.register.register module

class src.register.register.Registry(default: Type[T] | None = None)[source]

Bases: Generic[T]

Register of objects. Implementation of Register pattern

dispatch(name: str, purpose: AlgorithmPurpose) → Type[T][source]

Find object by name

Parameters:

  • name – Class name

  • purpose – Purpose of the algorithm (“NMParametric, NVParametric, NMVParametric, NMSemiparametric, NVSemiparametric, NMVSemiparametric”)

Returns: object

Raises:

ValueError – When object with this name was not found

register(name: str, purpose: AlgorithmPurpose) → Callable[source]

Register new object

Parameters:

  • name – Class name

  • purpose – Purpose of the algorithm (“NMParametric, NVParametric, NMVParametric, NMSemiparametric, NVSemiparametric, NMVSemiparametric”)

Returns: Decorator function

Raises:

ValueError – When class with this name was registered before
